description: During the [C0032](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0032) campaign, [TEMP.Veles](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0088) relied on encrypted SSH-based tunnels to transfer tools and for remote command/program execution.(Citation: FireEye TRITON 2019)

external_references.description: Miller, S, et al. (2019, April 10). TRITON Actor TTP Profile, Custom Attack Tools, Detections, and ATT&CK Mapping. Retrieved April 16, 2019.
